original: 啟稟大人，屬下已遣人對<color=#bceea7>$city1</color>樹上開花計謀遭遇了意料之外的問題，不慎失敗了！(<color=#bceea7>樹上開花 失敗</color>)
text: Master Qi, the subordinate has sent someone to the <color=#bceea7>$city1</color> tree blossoming strategy that encountered unexpected problems and accidentally failed! (<color=#bceea7>Flowering on the tree failed</color>)
